column6: Who is the Black Panther? Part 6 (of 6) It's a rumble in the jungle as the Wakandan royal family squares off against the Radioactive Man, and the Black Panther goes toe-to-toe with his arch-nemesis Klaw in a battle royale!
column8: | penciller (cover):Kaare Andrews | letterer:Randy Gentile | writer:Reginald Hudlin | inker:Klaus Janson | penciller:John Romita JR.
